com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions

Class SingleDocumentSessionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.SingleDocumentSessionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentSessionEventHandler, DocumentSessionProvider

    public class SingleDocumentSessionProvider
extends Object
implements DocumentSessionProvider
    The SingleDocumentSessionProvider is a DocumentSessionProvider for applications which just have one application document or application which have one GuiController per application document.
    The SingleDocumentSessionProvider could be created via GuiFactory.documentSessionProviders().

    • Method Detail

      • provideDocumentSession

        public DocumentSession provideDocumentSession()
        Specified by:
        provideDocumentSession in interface DocumentSessionProvider
        Returns:
        The DocumentSession for the active document. For each document just one DocumentSession should exist. If no active document exists you should return DocumentSessionsFactory.NULL() via GuiFactory.documentSessions().
        Use DocumentSessionsFactory.create(DocumentSessionComponentFactory, Extractor, com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.inline.markings.offset.OffsetEditorView) to create a new DocumentSession. See: DocumentSessionComponentFactory and Extractor
